Summary Note:
Fabbri Livi Donati and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Rome. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Fabbri Livi Donati is a 62 year old and comes from Italy.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Fabbri Livi Donati and Francesca have been married since 1998. Fabbri and Francesca have 1 child, named Rossi.
Education Background:
Fabbri graduated from Istituto Tecnico Industriale Alessandro Volta Torino in 1981.
After that, he went on to study at American University of Rome until 1985.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 38 years, Fabbri Livi Donati has established himself as a key player in the industry.
In 1987, Fabbri Livi Donati started working as a Research Scientist at Roche S.p.A., marking the beginning of his successful career.
He then transitioned to Roche S.p.A. as a Clinical Trials Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1988 till retirement.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 520000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Modena, Livorno and Udine, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
